name: Bartender Simulator 2000
description:
After slight delays I’ve finally released my newest little minigame, the Bartender Simulator 2000. In it, you take control of a brand new bartender, first day on the job as you try and make enough tips to pay your rent.

I spend way too much time in bars, and got the idea from talking to my service industry friends and observing customers. And, also, being a customer myself, I guess.

You can also play the game in your browser on your phone by going to http://nicestguys.com.
